pr_title: [eclipse/xtext#1629] ported more code from Xtend to Java

timeline.bodyText: A few unnecessary type arguments. The diamond op could help to simplify the code.

timeline.bodyText: Should use EcoreUtil.getExistingAdapter to benefit from the new EScannableAdapterList
